Posts.Content: On 7/22/2009 Mogal wrote: I was wondering if fish oil tablets and Arimidex are ok to take together.I wouldn't want anything to jeprodize the Arinidex I take.I too have had some stiffness occasionally,but not like I used to have.I have taken the arimidex for almost a year and a half and hardly any joint pain anywhere right now.I get my blood checked ever 3 months and everything fine.thanks for any information you might have.     7 22 09 Hi I'm a five year breast cancer survivor (mastectomy and too many surgeries, chemo and radiation). I've been on Arimidex since 2/05 and will stop on 2/10. I've always taken a big fish oil capsule with my daily vitamins--and have never had a problem with an Arimidex interaction. I used to have outrageous hot flashes, and my oncologist gave me different prescriptions, now, finally they have dwindled down to a few a week. Good luck! Elizabeth, AKA RVwoman
Posts.Title: Arimidex and fish oil taking together
